description: Protocol for adult (8-10 week) mouse kidney dissociation, performed on ice to reduce artifact gene expression.
before_start:
Prepare Bacillus Licheniformis enzyme mix just prior to starting dissociation:

 

Volume (µl) Reagent  Final concentration 
 894  DPBS  1X
 1  0.5 M EDTA  0.5 mM
 5  DNAse 1 (250 U/10 μL)  125 U / mL
 100  B. Lich (100 mg/mL)  10 mg/mL

+25 mg tissue / 1 mL enzyme mix

groups.group_name: Human Cell Atlas Method Development Community

guidelines:
Storage Conditions of Reagents 

 

Reagent

Storage Condition 

DPBS (no Ca, no Mg)

4°C

0.5 M EDTA

room temp.

RBC Lysis Buffer

 4°C

Protease from Bacillus Licheniformis

Store 100 μL aliquots (100 mg/mL) in DPBS at -80°C

DNAse

  Store 10 μL aliquots (250 U/10 μL) in DPBS at -80°C

 

 

Required Equipment

 

Equipment

Supplier

Catalog no.

Thermomixer C or R

Eppendorf

5382000015 / Z605271

 

 

The protocol workflow is as follows: 

 

A. Isolate Kidney

B. First layer

C. Second layer

D. Third layer

F. Preparing cells for Chromium
status_info: We use this protocol in our group and it is working

components.data: Remove fatty tissue and kidney capsule in ice-cold PBS.
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Remove fatty tissue and kidney capsule in ice-cold PBS.

components.data: Mince whole kidney on petri dish, on ice for 2 min until fine.
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Mince whole kidney on petri dish, on ice for 2 min until fine.

components.data: On petri dish weigh out 25 mg tissue. Using razor blade, transfer tissue to 1.5 mL tube containing 1 mL of enzyme mix (10 mg/mL b. lich).
components.name: Description

source_data.description: On petri dish weigh out 25 mg tissue. Using razor blade, transfer tissue to 1.5 mL tube containing 1 mL of enzyme mix (10 mg/mL b. lich).

components.data: Quickly dissect and isolate kidney and transfer to ice-cold PBS.
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Quickly dissect and isolate kidney and transfer to ice-cold PBS.

components.data: Incubate tube on ice for 2 min. Shake every 30 seconds.
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Incubate tube on ice for 2 min. Shake every 30 seconds.

components.data: After 2 min total time, triturate gently 20x using 1 mL pipet set to 700 μL.
components.name: Description

source_data.description: After 2 min total time, triturate gently 20x using 1 mL pipet set to 700 μL.

components.data: Triturate 10x every 2 minutes for 10 additional minutes (12 min total time) while incubating on ice.
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Triturate 10x every 2 minutes for 10 additional minutes (12 min total time) while incubating on ice.

components.data: Spin digest mix at 4° C 10 sec at 50 g to spin down cell clumps and leave dissociated cells in supernatant.
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Spin digest mix at 4° C 10 sec at 50 g to spin down cell clumps and leave dissociated cells in supernatant.

components.data: Remove 80% of supernatant containing single cells and apply to 30 µM filter on 50 mL conical; rinse filter with 8 mL ice-cold PBS/BSA 0.04% into 50 mL conical. Save conical with filter for subsequent steps.
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Remove 80% of supernatant containing single cells and apply to 30 µM filter on 50 mL conical; rinse filter with 8 mL ice-cold PBS/BSA 0.04% into 50 mL conical. Save conical with filter for subsequent steps.

components.data: Add additional 1 mL enzyme mix (10 mg/mL b. lich) to residual tissue chunks.
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Add additional 1 mL enzyme mix (10 mg/mL b. lich) to residual tissue chunks.

components.data: Triturate 10x with 1 mL pipet set to 700 μL.
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Triturate 10x with 1 mL pipet set to 700 μL.

components.data: Continue digesting while shaking in thermomixer, set to 4 ºC at 1200 RPM for 12 additional min (24 min total). Every 4 min passage 8X with 18 gauge needle (3X total).
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Continue digesting while shaking in thermomixer, set to 4 ºC at 1200 RPM for 12 additional min (24 min total). Every 4 min passage 8X with 18 gauge needle (3X total).

source_data.title: every 4 min passage 8X w/18 gauge needle (3X total)
set thermomixer to 4 ºC (can leave in cold room)

components.data: Spin at 4° C 10 sec for 50 g to spin down clumps of tissue, leaving released cells in supernatant.
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Spin at 4° C 10 sec for 50 g to spin down clumps of tissue, leaving released cells in supernatant.

components.data: Pipet ~80% of supernatant containing released cells to the 30 μM filter (the same tube/filter as used in previous steps). Rinse filter with 8 mL ice-cold PBS/BSA 0.04%.
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Pipet ~80% of supernatant containing released cells to the 30 μM filter (the same tube/filter as used in previous steps). Rinse filter with 8 mL ice-cold PBS/BSA 0.04%.

components.data: Add additional 1 mL enzyme mix (10 mg/mL b. lich) to residual tissue chunks.
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Add additional 1 mL enzyme mix (10 mg/mL b. lich) to residual tissue chunks.

components.data: Continue dissociating remaining clumps at 1400 RPM in thermomixer at 4° C for 12 additional minutes (36 min total). Every 4 min passage 8X w/18 gauge needle w/1 mL syringe (3X total).
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Continue dissociating remaining clumps at 1400 RPM in thermomixer at 4° C for 12 additional minutes (36 min total). Every 4 min passage 8X w/18 gauge needle w/1 mL syringe (3X total).

source_data.title: every 4 min passage 8X with 18 gauge needle

components.data: Triturate 10x and apply total volume of remaining digest mix to the same 30-μM filter used in previous steps.
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Triturate 10x and apply total volume of remaining digest mix to the same 30-μM filter used in previous steps.
Rinse filter with 8 mL ice-cold PBS/BSA 0.04%.

components.data: Transfer flow-through to two 15 mL conicals.
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Transfer flow-through to two 15 mL conicals.
Spin 500 G for 5 min at 4° C.
Remove supernatant.
Triturate 20x.
Let sit 2 min on ice.

components.data: Re-suspend both tubes (combined) in 100 μL total volume PBS/BSA 0.04% and add 900 μL RBC lysis buffer (in 15 mL conical).
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Re-suspend both tubes (combined) in 100 μL total volume PBS/BSA 0.04% and add 900 μL RBC lysis buffer (in 15 mL conical).
Add additional 9 mL ice-cold PBS/BSA 0.04%.
Spin 500 G for 5 min at 4° C.

components.data: Re-suspend pellet in 1 mL ice-cold PBS/BSA 0.04%.
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Re-suspend pellet in 1 mL ice-cold PBS/BSA 0.04%.

components.data: Analyze using hemocytometer with trypan blue. Adjust concentration to 1000 cells / µL for 10x Chromium or 100 cells / µL for DropSeq.
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Analyze using hemocytometer with trypan blue. Adjust concentration to 1000 cells / µL for 10x Chromium or 100 cells / µL for DropSeq.
